name: Cabin Fever (Iora Rua)
description:
A short survival-horror game I made in 2 weeks for Halloween! You are stranded in a forest swarmed with crazed cultists out for blood. Try to escape before you become their next victim!

Happy Halloween!

Helpful tips - Be sure to grab the shotgun by the outhouse. Keep an eye out for lanterns, they lead you on the correct path!
